reviewText: I'm a student of Lloyd Irvin and although I was not a student of his when all the controversy was abound, I can say that he is a great BJJ martial artist and instructor. I refuse to pass judgement on someone especially if I do not have the entire story. Speaking as a student. He knows his craft hands down.

Never buy anything from Lloyd Irvin.  This guy is a scammer, disreputable, and not only are his products generally junk, google his name to see why you should never, ever support him in any way.

Stay away - this is junk for the gullible.
